actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: To extend the existing suspensions of duty on certain chemicals.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 1993, the suspension of duty on: (1) 6-amino-1-naphthol-3-sulfonic acid; (2) 1-amino-2-chloro-4-hydroxy-anthraquinone; and (3) 2-(4-aminophenyl) -6-methyl-benzothiazole-7-sulfonic acid.

titles.title: To extend the existing suspensions of duty on certain chemicals.
